--4th of July 2012 Firework local Tool = script.Parent local Handle = Tool.Handle
local ReloadTime = 10
--Shoots a rocket off into the sky function FireRocket(Position) --Clone the handle local Rocket = Handle:Clone() Rocket.CanCollide = false Rocket.Transparency = 0 Rocket.Position = Position Rocket.Name = "Firework" Rocket.Parent = game.Workspace
--Tag the player local CreatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") CreatorTag.Parent = Rocket CreatorTag.Value = game.Players:playerFromCharacter(Tool.Parent) CreatorTag.Name = "Creator"
--Attach the RocketFlight script to it local FlightScript = Tool.FireworkExplosion:Clone() FlightScript.Parent = Rocket FlightScript.Disabled = false
--Attach a particle effect to it flying off into the sky local FlightParticle = Instance.new("Sparkles") FlightParticle.Name = "Particle" FlightParticle.Color = BrickColor.Yellow().Color FlightParticle.Parent = Rocket
end
Tool.Enabled = true function onActivated() --Make sure we can't fire alot of rockets if not Tool.Enabled then return end Tool.Enabled = false
--Hide the handle Tool.Handle.Transparency = 1
--Shoot the rocket FireRocket(Tool.Handle.Position)
--Clean up and re-enabled the tool wait(ReloadTime) Tool.Handle.Transparency = 0 Tool.Enabled = true
end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated)

--4th of July 2012 Firework function WaitForChild(ChildName) while script:FindFirstChild(ChildName) == nil do wait() end return script:FindFirstChild(ChildName) end
local Debris = game.Debris local Rocket = script.Parent
local ScreamSound = WaitForChild("Scream") local ExplosionSound = WaitForChild("Explosion")
--Positions for the USA particles local ParticlePositions = {} ParticlePositions.U = { Vector3.new(-2, 4, 0), Vector3.new(-2, 3, 0), Vector3.new(-2, 2, 0), Vector3.new(-2, 1, 0), Vector3.new(-2, 0, 0), Vector3.new(-2, -1, 0), --[[Vector3.new(-1, -1, 0),]]-- Vector3.new(-1, -2, 0), Vector3.new(0, -2, 0), Vector3.new(1, -2, 0), --[[Vector3.new(1, -1, 0),]] Vector3.new(2, -1, 0), Vector3.new(2, 0, 0), Vector3.new(2, 1, 0), Vector3.new(2, 2, 0), Vector3.new(2, 3, 0), Vector3.new(2, 4, 0) }
ParticlePositions.S = { Vector3.new(1, 4, 0), Vector3.new(0, 4, 0), Vector3.new(-1, 4, 0), Vector3.new(-2, 3, 0), Vector3.new(-2, 2, 0), Vector3.new(-1, 1, 0), Vector3.new(0, 1, 0), Vector3.new(1, 0, 0), Vector3.new(1, -1, 0), Vector3.new(0, -2, 0), Vector3.new(-1, -2, 0), Vector3.new(-2, -2, 0) }
ParticlePositions.A = { Vector3.new(-2, -2, 0), Vector3.new(-2, -1, 0), Vector3.new(-2, 0, 0), Vector3.new(-2, 1, 0), Vector3.new(-2, 2, 0), Vector3.new(-1, 3, 0), Vector3.new(0, 4, 0), Vector3.new(1, 3, 0), Vector3.new(2, 2, 0), Vector3.new(2, 1, 0), Vector3.new(2, 0, 0), Vector3.new(2, -1, 0), Vector3.new(2, -2, 0), Vector3.new(-1, 0, 0), Vector3.new(0, 0, 0), Vector3.new(1, 0, 0) }
local Colors = { Color3.new(1,0,0), Color3.new(1,1,1), Color3.new(0,0,1) }
--Flies the rocket in the direction it's pointing function Fly() --Add some force to the rocket to make it fly local UpForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") UpForce.Parent = Rocket UpForce.Name = "RocketThrust"
ScreamSound:Play() --Fly the direction we are pointing for i = 1, 30 do UpForce.force = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) * Rocket:GetMass() * 98 * 2.2 wait(.1) end end
--Displays a letter made out of particles. --ParticleTable - The letter to display as a table of Vector3s --Parent - The object that displays the string --Offset - The offset from the center to display the letter --Color - The color to diplay the letters as function DisplayParticleLetter(ParticleTable, Parent, Offset, Color) for i = 1, #ParticleTable do --Create the parts for the particles to emit from local ParticlePoint = Instance.new("Part") ParticlePoint.CanCollide = false ParticlePoint.Anchored = true ParticlePoint.Size = Vector3.new(1,1,1) ParticlePoint.Parent = Parent ParticlePoint.Position = Parent.Position + Offset + (ParticleTable[i] * 2) ParticlePoint.Transparency = 1
--Create the particles for display local Particle = Instance.new("Fire") Particle.Color = Color Particle.Parent = ParticlePoint
delay(5, function() --Send them flying local ParticleForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") ParticleForce.Parent = ParticlePoint ParticleForce.force = Vector3.new(math.random(-20,20), math.random(20, 50), math.random(-20,20)) * 10 Debris:AddItem(ParticleForce, .3)
ParticlePoint.Anchored = false ParticlePoint.CanCollide = true
Debris:AddItem(ParticlePoint, 4.5 + math.random())
end )
end
end
--Creates a random number of particles and lets them fall down from the sky. function ParticleExplosion() local NumParticles = math.random(5,15) for i = 0, NumParticles do --Create the parts for the particles to emit from local ParticlePoint = Instance.new("Part") ParticlePoint.Size = Vector3.new(1,1,1) ParticlePoint.Parent = Rocket ParticlePoint.Position = Rocket.Position + Vector3.new(math.random(1,5), 0, math.random(1,5) ) ParticlePoint.Transparency = 1
--Create the particles for display local Particle = Instance.new("Fire") Particle.Color = Colors[math.random(1, #Colors)] Particle.Parent = ParticlePoint
--Send them flying local ParticleForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") ParticleForce.Parent = ParticlePoint ParticleForce.force = Vector3.new(math.random(-20,20), 0, math.random(-20,20)) * 10 Debris:AddItem(ParticleForce, .3)
Debris:AddItem(ParticlePoint, 4.5 + math.random()) end
end
--Makes the rocket explode and display USA function Explode() --Explode the rocket ExplosionSound:Play() Rocket.Transparency = 1 Rocket:FindFirstChild("Particle"):Destroy() Rocket.Anchored = true
--Show the particles DisplayParticleLetter(ParticlePositions.U, Rocket, Vector3.new(-11,0,0), Colors[1]) wait() DisplayParticleLetter(ParticlePositions.S, Rocket, Vector3.new(0,0,0), Colors[2]) wait() DisplayParticleLetter(ParticlePositions.A, Rocket, Vector3.new(10,0,0), Colors[3]) ParticleExplosion() --Clean up Debris:AddItem(Rocket, 10.5)
end
--Fly then explode. Duh.
Fly()
Explode()
